page.title: 13ATTITUDES
page.content: {VILLAGE GRUMBLES {No main gas}even though we have a substation in Square 2. {Property prices.}We are near enough to London for people to commute.This means that houses are too expensive for young people to buy. {Parking on the main street.}High St. is very narrow and the houses have no garages so cars park in the street. {Dangerous roads. }There are no pavements in parts of the main street so it is dangerous for children to walk to the shops. {The new flats.}There are some new flats which are very tall.Everybody calls them "the monstrosities".They spoil the High Street. {No buses for the teenagers.}The last bus goes to Hitchin at 6.30.This means it is very hard for teenagers to go out in the evening.
